title: TASK TRANSFER
content_html:
Inspiration

Knowing that Magic Leap's corporate strategy has shifted to enterprise, we saw a great opportunity.

What it does

TASK TRANSFER ENTERPRISE TRAINING in XR�End-to-end solution addressing the world's aging workforce

  1. Expert Wears Magic Leap and Performs Task - Magic Leap Records

  2. Novice Wears Magic Leap and Watches Recording - Performs Task Correctly - Magic Leap Records

  3. Expert Evaluates Novice Task Performance Remotely

How we built it

We used Unity and Magic Leap's developer resources to build an app that will spearhead Magic Leap's Enterprise offerings.

Challenges we ran into

Some of our team is developing on Magic Leap for the first time. There were some initial setup quirks.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

We were each able to build a new feature and commit to the repo on time.

What we learned

We learned a ton about teamwork and built great friendships. We each learned to build to Magic Leap

What's next for TASK TRANSFER

This is a very viable enterprise product. We will start pitching aerospace companies this week.

the world's aging workforce

2. Novice Wears Magic Leap and Watches Recording - Performs Task Correctly - Magic Leap Records
3. Expert Evaluates Novice Task Performance Remotely


## How we built it


We used Unity and Magic Leap's developer resources to build an app that will spearhead Magic Leap's Enterprise offerings. 


## Challenges we ran into


Some of our team is developing on Magic Leap for the first time. There were some initial setup quirks.


## Accomplishments that we're proud of
